General.Name: RMG Acquisition Corp. III
General.Description: RMG Acquisition Corp. III focuses on effecting a merger, amalgamation, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or other similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 50 West Street, New York, NY, United States, 10006
